How to create a News Item

  • Version: 1.0
  • Created: 01/11/2019 klm
  • Last Updated: 01/11/2019
  • Intended Audience: UCOM

Summary

Prerequisites

  1. Access to subdomain
  2. pictures as needed
  3. content

Procedure

  1. login
  2. content > add content > news/ spotlight
